name: G. Ramirez and the Missing Hat
name_original: G. Ramirez and the Missing Hat
description:
The Missing Hat is a point and click adventure game where you help a detective look for their hat in their horrible, horrible, messy office. This game was made for My First Game Jam (Winter 2019) with Adventure Game Studio, and it's the first game I've ever made so let me know what you think!

Controls: mouse only

This game's devlog can be found here in the MFGJ community.

Credits

  • Art and coding by wDracaena (me)
  • Music by Kevin McLeod, from Free Music Archive.

Thanks for taking a look!
